item.title: Should we be teaching children about new technology like blockchain?
item.description:
Should we be teaching children about new technology like blockchain?

Answer (1 of 3): When children reach the age where they go on-line and can access a variety of places on the web, they should be taught about several technical concepts. Blockchains would be pretty far down my list. P2P vs centralized architecture might precede blockchains and cryptocurrencies. ...

item.title: New Bitwala Partnership With Shapeshift Enables Modern Banking With Altcoins
item.description:
New Bitwala Partnership With Shapeshift Enables Modern Banking With Altcoins

Partnerships are being forced in the world of Bitcoin and cryptocurrency around the clock. Bitwala, one of the leading Bitcoin payroll providers, partnered with ShapeShift to accept all the great cryptocurrencies. This is kind of interesting news, as all of the existing Bitwala services will now encompass altcoins as well.

item.title: Major Belgian Retailers Will Enable Payment Via QR Codes
item.description:
Major Belgian Retailers Will Enable Payment Via QR Codes

For some unknown reason, making payments via QR code is gaining a lot of popularity in Belgium. Not because of mass Bitcoin adoption, unfortunately. Atos, the primary payment service provider active in Belgium, has rolled out a new SmartPay function through its Worldline subsidiary. Smart Pay works with QR codes for payments.

item.title: IBM Unveils New Cloud Blockchain Service - CoinDesk
item.description:
IBM Unveils New Cloud Blockchain Service - CoinDesk

IBM today unveiled a new service designed to help regulated businesses test and run blockchain projects meant to handle private or sensitive business data. Dubbed the IBM 'secure blockchain cloud environment', the service is actually an integration of IBM's existing blockchain cloud offering and IBM LinuxONE, a Linux server designed to protect against 'back doors' the company argues could occur in other cloud-based blockchain networks by securing entry points and fighting against insider threats.

item.title: Is Bitcoin Wallet Airbitz Scraping By?
item.description:
Is Bitcoin Wallet Airbitz Scraping By?

One of the most active companies in the bitcoin space - sponsoring events, parties, and conferences - Airbitz has sought to put San Diego on the map for tech startups. But, could the firm be treading water?

item.title: Linux User? The US Government May Classify You an Extremist
item.description:
Linux User? The US Government May Classify You an Extremist

Do you use decentralized, open source software? The US government considers you an extremist. According to leaked documents related to the XKeyscore spying program, the National Security Agency (NSA) flags as an "extremist" anyone who uses Tor or Tails Linux, or who subscribes to Linux Journal.

item.title: Spanish University Holds Two-Day Bitcoin & Blockchain Course
item.description:
Spanish University Holds Two-Day Bitcoin & Blockchain Course

Today, the University of Cantabria is opening a Also read: MIT's Riffle Claims to Be More Anonymous Than Tor two-day event to teach Bitcoin and blockchain technology with the goal of educating people about the power of disruptive financial technology. During the July 14-15 event, students and guests will receive education on Bitcoin innovation and blockchain technology solutions.

item.title: Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - Buying Dips Worked - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - Buying Dips Worked - NEWSBTC

Ethereum price showed more positive signs, and traded higher. Can it continue to trade higher and can we buy more? Ethereum price showed more positive signs, and traded higher. Can it continue to trade higher and can we buy more? Ethereum price continued to trade higher against the US Dollar, and posted yet another break.

item.title: Blockchain Social Platform Steemit Suffers Cyberattack
item.description:
Blockchain Social Platform Steemit Suffers Cyberattack

Blockchain-powered social media platform Steemit, a new novel experiment in social media that sees users rewarded in the token cryptocurrency Steem has been the target of a cyber attack. Steemit, a new social media website that has grown tremendously since its launch two months ago has seen its token cryptocurrency Steem's value explode over the past week.
